articles.author: Sky Sports
articles.title: Ryder Cup 2020: Henrik Stenson named as vice-captain for Padraig Harrington's European team - Sky Sports
articles.description: Padraig Harrington has announced that Henrik Stenson will be the fifth and final vice-captain for Team Europe at this month's Ryder Cup.
articles.content:
Can Team Europe stop the Ryder Cup from falling into the hands of their arch rivals? Watch live from September 24-26 live on Sky Sports
